newsitem.title: HONG KONG: APT Hong Kong IPO price seen at HK$15.48-19.35.
newsitem.headline: APT Hong Kong IPO price seen at HK$15.48-19.35.

text.p: APT Satellite Holdings Ltd is expected to price its Hong Kong offering of 10.5 million shares in a range of HK$15.48 to HK$19.35 per share, market sources said after a listing presentation on Friday.

The preliminary listing prospectus of the satellite services provider stated that net tangible book value per share before the global offering was at HK$2.02 and the proforma net tangible book value per share afterwards was HK$5.62, sources said.
APT plans to seek a dual listing in Hong Kong and New York, expected later in December, although a schedule was not available, sources said.
APT is offering 105 million shares -- 52.5 million for the U.S. market, 42 million for international placement and 10.5 million for public offer in Hong Kong.
Earlier in November, APT said proceeds of the offer of about US$250 million would be used to repay bank debts and for financing the construction and launch of future satellites.
Donaldson Lufkin & Jenrette is the sponsor of the issue.
Underwriters includes Credit Lyonnais Securities Asia, HSBC Investment Bank Asia, Wheelock Natwest, China Development Finance, J.P. Morgan and Nikko Securities, sources said.
